name: Resistance (winwanwon)
description:
Keep survive in the room and defeat monsters. The monsters summon by your steps.
Use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to move, SPACE to jump and LEFT SHIFT to shoot.

This is my first game jam and I made this game within several hours because I don't have much time to do the game jam. The character was made by my friend for my previous game project (abandoned) so I use it in this game.

Hope you enjoy this game :)

Note: Sorry about the left shift problem (sticky key) D: I developed this game on OSX and I forgot about it
